actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Frontier Military Road for Study for potential addition to the National Trails System.
short_title: Frontier Military Road Study Act of 1991

summary.text: Frontier Military Road Study Act of 1991 - Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Frontier Military Road connecting certain military forts in Minnesota, Kansas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, and Louisiana for study for potential addition to the National Trails System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Frontier Military Road Study Act of 1991
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Frontier Military Road for Study for potential addition to the National Trails System.
